item.title: Life After Segfaults
item.description: Frequently, when I travel, I end up at some point on a week/poor internet connection, and I spend a lot of time looking at the words “Hmm. Weâ€™re having trouble finding that site.” As I sit there, I wonder: why am I seeing this? More specifically, why is it up to me to manually hit the “refresh” button? This feeling repeats, often with growing frustration, across apps and services as downloads, sessions, and tasks fail and time-out.
